lj.lj_ly: He can kiss off that promotion.

phrase.cizu_name: kiss something goodbye (或 kiss goodbye to somethin

lj.lj_ly: I could kiss my career goodbye.
lj.lj_ls: 我可以接受我事业上的损失。

jx.jx_en_mean: an action or event that causes certain failure for an enterprise
jx.jx_cn_mean: 使企业挫败的行为（或事件）

lj.lj_ly: it would be the kiss of death for the company if it could be proved that the food was unsafe.
lj.lj_ls: 如果能够证明那食品是不安全的话，这将给公司以致命的一击。

jx.jx_en_mean: a ceremonial kiss given or exchanged as a sign of unity, especially the kiss of the consecrated elements during the Christian Eucharist
jx.jx_cn_mean: （团结友爱的象征的）接吻礼；（尤指教会圣餐时亲吻圣体的）亲吻礼

jx.jx_en_mean: (N. Amer. informal)dismiss someone rudely; end a relationship abruptly
jx.jx_cn_mean: (北美，非正式)粗暴解雇；突然结束关系

jx.jx_en_mean: (N. Amer. informal)behave sycophantically or obsequiously towards (someone) in order to obtain something
To act submissively or obsequiously in order to gain favor.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 奉承，拍马屁：为了获取好感而装出顺从的或奉承的样子

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English cyssan (verb), of Germanic origin; related to Dutch kussen and German küssen

entry.def: If you kiss someone, you touch them with your lips to show affection or sexual desire, or to greet them or say goodbye.

example.ex: She leaned up and kissed him on the cheek...
example.tran: 她倾身向前亲吻了他的面颊。

example.ex: She kissed me hard on the mouth...

entry.def: If you kiss something, you touch it lightly with your lips, usually as a sign of respect.

example.ex: The men stepped forward to kiss the hand of their mentor...
example.tran: 这些男子走上前去轻吻他们导师的手。

example.ex: She bowed her head and kissed the Archbishop's ring.
example.tran: 她低下头轻吻大主教的戒指。

entry.def: If you say that something kisses another thing, you mean that it touches that thing very gently.

example.ex: The wheels of the aircraft kissed the runway.

entry.def: If you blow someone a kiss or blow a kiss, you touch the palm of your hand lightly with your lips, and then blow across your hand towards the person, in order to show them your affection.

example.tran: 玛丽亚给了他一个飞吻。

example.ex: Amy blew a kiss from the door.
example.tran: 埃米在门口做了个飞吻的动作。

entry.tran: 任其失去；放弃；承认对…无能为力
entry.def: If you say that you kiss something goodbye or kiss goodbye to something, you accept the fact that you are going to lose it, although you do not want to.

example.ex: I felt sure I'd have to kiss my dancing career goodbye.
example.tran: 我明确感觉到我将不得不与我的舞蹈生涯说再见了。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of caressing with the lips (or an instance thereof)
2. a cookie made of egg whites and sugar

sentences.sentence: "there was a brief kiss of their hands in passing"

means.word_mean: 1. touch with the lips or press the lips (against someone's mouth or other body part) as an expression of love, greeting, etc.;

sentences.sentence: "She kissed her grandfather on the forehead when she entered the room"
"the blossoms were kissed by the soft rain"

list.explanation: (指某人丧命、遭灾或某事溃败、解体的直接原因)致命伤，祸根

example.en: Your attitude was the kiss of death for your employment here.
example.zh: 你的态度对于你在这儿的工作而言致命的弱点。

auth_sentence.content: It never occurred to me to kiss my father.
auth_sentence.res_content: It never occurred to me to kiss my father.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It never occurred to me to kiss my father.

auth_sentence.content: And one sweet kiss shall pay this countless debt.
auth_sentence.res_content: And one sweet kiss shall pay this countless debt.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: And one sweet kiss shall pay this countless debt.

auth_sentence.content: Her father would seize Annie for a good-bye kiss.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her father would seize Annie for a good-bye kiss.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her father would seize Annie for a good-bye kiss.

Sentence.sentence: You would not be surprised if a stranger tried to shake hands when you were introduced, but you might be a little startled if they bowed, started to stroke you or kissed you on both cheeks.

sentences.en: They were so excited that they kissed and kissed again.
sentences.cn: 他们激动得一次又一次地亲吻。

sentences.en: He took her in his arms and kissed her.
My mother gave me a kiss on the forehead.
